mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.content, ua.avatar, ua.nickname, IF(rua.nickname IS NULL, 'æ— ', rua.nickname) AS replyNickname, a.title AS articleTitle, c.create_time FROM t_comment c LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, title FROM t_article) a ON a.id = c.article_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, avatar, nickname FROM t_user_auth) ua ON ua.id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, nickname FROM t_user_auth) rua ON rua.id = c.reply_user_id ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
